text: hey everyone Chris and Sarah here and I
have some really exciting news I am
going to be in not just one or two but
three panels at this year's buffer
festival if you don't know what buffer
festival is it's a huge YouTube event
that happens each year into toronto and
it's like the tif the toronto
international film festival of youtube
you'll get to come and eat your favorite
YouTube personalities and also watched
them premiere they're never seen before
videos on the big screen the three
panels that I will be on this year are
the travel and adventure panel the
Canadian creators and then lifestyle and
beauty how it works is you buy a ticket
for each individual screening and each
screening is about 90 minutes long and
will take place in two of one of the two
theaters beautiful theatres in Toronto
and there you'll get to see new video
content from your favorite creators as
well as ask of any questions that you
might have there's also a red carpet
event on Friday October 23rd where you
can come and watch and meet your
favorite youtubers walk the red carpet
at roy thomson hall if you are in
toronto if you are from toronto or if
you're going to be traveling in toronto
I really hope to see you guys there I
